articles.title: 9 reasons to have a tablespoon of Isabgol daily - The Times of India
articles.description: ​It is a natural fiber derived from the seeds of the Plantago ovata plant. It is widely recognized for its health benefits, particularly in promoting digestive health and relieving constipation.
articles.content: Isabgol helps in weight management by promoting a feeling of fullness, reducing appetite, and aiding in the elimination of waste and toxins from the body.
